title: 109_s1642
content: Amends the Controlled Substance Import and Export Act to prohibit manufacturing, distributing, importing, exporting, or possessing with intent to distribute or manufacture a controlled substance knowing or intending that such activity aids or provides support to: (1) a foreign terrorist organization. Or (2) any person or group involved in planning, preparing for, or carrying out a terrorist offense. Provides that the government shall not be required, in a prosecution for such a violation, to prove that a defendant knew that an organization was designated as a foreign terrorist organization.
